WHAT TYPE OF PROCRASTINATOR ARE YOU?
The Art of Procrastination
YOU ARE

Steady Randy

20% Procrastination

Congratulations, you are Steady Randy! Steady Randy is a person that can prioritized their objective effectively while doing a little procrastination along the way. And that’s good, while sometimes being tired is their main problem because they are rarely doing procrastination or other relacing activities...
